Module.Name: MBDuino
Module.Brief: Bridge between MakeBus and Arduino(tm) Shield
Module.Overview: The MBDuino is a module that has a MakerBus connector and can accept a stack of 1 or more Arduino(tm) compatible shields. It consists of an ATmega324 running at 16MHz with the pins connected up to be compatible with an Arduino(tm) Uno(tm).
